channel.title: ggstatsplot on UKA R Code Club Test
channel.description: Recent content in ggstatsplot on UKA R Code Club Test

item.title: Data Visualization
item.author: rpauli@ukaachen.de (Roman Pauli)
item.description: library(knitr) opts_chunk$set( echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE ) here package library("here") # getwd() ggplot2 library(ggplot2) results <- read.csv("results.csv") #plot mean and SE of data r <- ggplot(results, aes(timepoint, normalized_area, color = construct)) + labs(y = "y", x = "x") + ggtitle("") + guides(colour = guide_legend(title = "")) + stat_summary(fun = mean, geom = "line") + stat_summary(fun.data = mean_se, geom = "pointrange", size = 0.25) r #lay out panels in a grid s <- r + facet_grid(cols = vars(rapa)) s viridis package Colorblind-friendly color maps
